New Love: The First Bass Is the Deepest

July 20, 2016

I’m so happy with my new bass right now, I had to post some pictures. It’s a 5-string Marcus Miller V7 Swamp-Ash with maple neck and it’s the first bass I own. Maybe I will record something as soon as my playing matches the beauty of the bass (; But I guess this could take some time and maybe it will even cost me some bleeding fingers (;
